name: Iodex Balm
description: Iodex with its power packed formula helps provide a warming action upon massage that helps in reducing muscular inflammation & provides effective relief from every type of body pain. Iodex Balm is a power packed formula of 5 natural ingredients – Gandapuro oil, Pudina ka Phool, Nilgiri oil, Turpine ka oil, & Lavanga ka oil. These ingredients help provide a warm & soothing effect at the site of pain that helps reduce inflammation & relieves pain. Iodex, a trusted pain relief brand in India for close to 100 years, helps provide effective relief from different types of musculo-skeletal pains like neck/shoulder pain, back pain, joint pain, sprains etc. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
